text.tspan: A complex VLA-KB-CoT planner cannot be evaluated monolithically. A failure in the final task

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:26.66666667px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: provides no insight into the root cause.¹

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:26.66666667px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: We will adopt a rigorous protocol to test the agent at all levels, from its individual components

tspan.style: -inkscape-font-specification:'Segoe UI, Calibri, sans-serif, Normal';font-family:'Segoe UI', Calibri, sans-serif;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;font-stretch:normal;font-variant:normal;font-size:26.66666667px;font-variant-ligatures:normal;font-variant-caps:normal;font-variant-numeric:normal;font-variant-east-asian:normal

text.tspan: to the fully integrated system, allowing for precise bottleneck identification.²
